# RefinementTagBase.FilterEffect method

Compute the effect this tag has on a collection of pages.

```csharp
public abstract void FilterEffect(IEnumerable<PageNode> pages)
```

## Remarks

This method sets the observable properties [`FilteredPageCount`](./FilteredPageCount.md) and [`FilteredPageCountDelta`](./FilteredPageCountDelta.md).
